content: The bulk data documentation currently says that a JSON operation outcome is optional when returning an error from the server during the async operations
FHIR-I would like to make it mandatory. We're doing that because experience with the wider API has lead for requests for consistency, that it's always required to return an operation outcome
what do people think about this? @Dan Gottlieb @Josh Mandel
Isn't this what https://github.com/smart-on-fhir/fhir-bulk-data-docs/pull/58 is about? (If not, then I goofed)
